name: Back To Roots
description:
A short game developed and submitted for the 2023 Global Game Jam event.

Find your family-turned haunted within the forest, and take matters into your own hands.

Developed By:

- LIAM - Programmer (Me!)

- MIKHA - Programmer

- FLORIN  -Programmer and Writer

- FAIZA - 2D Artist

- CALLUM - 3D Artist

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/alwod/GameJam2023
